meanings.sent1: The coin got stuck in the slot of the vending machine.
meanings.sent2: She slid the paper into the slot of the mailbox.
meanings.sent3: The key perfectly fit into the slot of the door lock.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight streamed through the slot in the curtains.
meanings.sent5: The cat squeezed through the narrow slot in the fence.

meanings.definition: A time assigned for a specific task or activity
meanings.sent1: His lunch break was scheduled in the afternoon slot.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was set for the morning slot.
meanings.sent3: She managed to squeeze a quick nap into her lunch slot.
meanings.sent4: The movie premiere was in the prime time slot on TV.
meanings.sent5: The dentist appointment filled the last available slot for the day.

meanings.definition: A position in a list or schedule
meanings.sent1: Her name was in the first slot on the sign-up sheet.
meanings.sent2: The team secured a top slot in the competition rankings.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally double-booked himself in two slots.
meanings.sent4: The concert tickets sold out quickly, leaving no slots available.
meanings.sent5: The presentation was moved to a later slot in the agenda.

meanings.definition: To fit into or assign to a slot
meanings.sent1: She managed to slot all the puzzle pieces together.
meanings.sent2: He slotted the book neatly onto the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The teacher slotted the students into groups for the project.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic expertly slotted the new part into place.
meanings.sent5: He carefully slotted the key into the lock and turned it.
